name: Death Parking: Free 3D Real Race
description:
Death Parking gives you the ultimate drive ‘n’ parking experience with over 24 thrilling levels!
Cruise through the hurdles; picking targets in the way; select & drive from four shiny sports cars with colors of your choice and get hooked for hours! Easy to play but slightly tricky to master, The Death Parking game will sharpens your skills in navigation, precision and reflexes as you drive & park the car at given spot while avoiding obstacles with in given time. The realistic driving physics and handling the wheel can challenge even the most adept gamers.

How to Play:
1. Tilt left/right your device to steer the wheels
2. Touch and hold right button for car acceleration
3. Touch and hold left button to apply brakes or reverse

Challenges:
- Avoid explosive drums
- Take care not to fall in sea water over the edge
- Jump over ramps with enough speed
- Every second counts so pump up the speed
- Apply brakes near parking box
- Keep an eye on the moving container on rail and avoid hitting it

Features:
- Excellent 3D environment
- 4 Shiny Sports cars with customized coloring
- Numerous challenging parking quests
- Cool 3D graphics and visual effects
- Real Engine Sound and smoke from tyres when car accelerate with gas pumping
effects
- Motion censor for an enhanced driving experience.
- Simple, yet Engaging Game play!
- Easy GUI and controls
- Responsive Controls!
- New Surprises in Upcoming Updates!
